about_the_game:
Fifa and E-Football Killer!

Rapid Soccer focuses on fun gameplay and delivering the best soccer/football simulation experience! No stupid microtransactions, just pure footballing fun!

Career Mode

The game comes with a comprehensive career mode with a huge number of competitions to choose from.

Guide your country to footballing glory in the World Cup or Continental Cup.

Take over as a manager of your favorite club and lead them to league and cup success.

As a manager, you can buy/sell players to create a team of your dreams. You will be negotiating player contracts, picking club sponsors, choosing the first team players, setting the team tactics, and so on.

Or you can just leave it all to your assistant manager and focus on actually playing the football matches!

Game Editor

Use the in-game editor to modify the stats of existing players and teams. Or you can even create new custom players and teams.

If you're bored of the competitions in the career mode, you can simply create new custom tournaments using the editor.

Great Match Atmosphere

Rapid Soccer is the first soccer video game that puts great emphasis on re-creating the atmosphere of a soccer match.

During the matches, you will see the fans reacting in a lively way to the events on the pitch.

They will cheer on good scoring opportunities, good tackles, good passes, etc. They will release a collective gasp after a missed chance.

The game will let you enjoy a truly realistic soccer match experience!

Highly intelligent AI

In most soccer video games you will see the AI players just run left and right without much agenda or thought.

In Rapid Soccer we put a lot of effort into creating an AI that plays in an intelligent almost human-like way.

Watch as the AI players make intelligent runs off the ball and pick out clever passes to pierce through your defense.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: The first truly physics-based football (soccer) game with highly intelligent AI opponents. Jump into career mode and guide your favorite club or country to cup glory! Play with up to 8 friends in local multiplayer or online with Steam remote play!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
